original_text: Then Mordecai told them to reply to Esther, “Do not think to yourself that in the king's palace you will escape any more than all the other Jews.
korean_text: 모르드개가 그를 시켜 에스더에게 회답하되 너는 왕궁에 있으니 모든 유다인 중에 홀로 목숨을 건지리라 생각하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Then Mordecai told them to reply to Esther,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모르드개가 그들에게 에스더에게 회답하라고 말했다,

sentences.original_text: that in the king's palace you will escape
any more than all the other Jews.
